name: Solar System Simulator (Captain Garneto)
description:
A sample of our Solar System to explore.

There are two exploration systems, to change between by clicking 'c' quickly:

The first one 'Watch Targets' is the screen's target focus. Left-Click to select a target to focus the screen on. Right-click to focus on the sun. Click 'c' quickly to change to Arrow Keys.

The arrow keys exploration, use Arrow Keys (or 'a', 'd', 'w', 's') to move the screen. Use 'z', 'x' to rotate horizontally. Click on an object to plan the screen's next target focus. Click 'c' quickly to change to 'Watch Targets'.

Created by D. A. Rozek
